title: Let’s Talk About the Housing Market (Hour 3)
description:
Dave Ramsey & George Kamel discuss:

The current state of the housing market,

Feeling like you can't get ahead on paying down debt,

Counting stock options toward retirement,

Dealing with messy family money drama,

Budgeting on a bi-weekly paycheck,

Buying a house with a roommate.


Support Our Sponsor:
Gazelle Debit Card

Gazelle – Terms & Conditions Apply. Visit www.ramseysolutions.com/gazelle for more information. Established by Pathward, N.A., Member FDIC.
